thread.title: ECB Takes Step Toward Ending Its Stimulus Program

author: Tom Fairless
title: ECB Takes Step Toward Ending Its Stimulus Program
text:
European Central Bank President Mario Draghi said tariffs proposed by President Donald Trump raise questions about the strength of the trans-Atlantic alliance, as the bank signaled a shift toward tighter monetary policy.
Speaking during a news conference Thursday, Mr. Draghi said the immediate impact of the proposed tariffs on steel and aluminum would likely be small, but could be greater if other countries retaliated.
